name: wheat stitch™ ghost
notes:
get ready for a hauntingly cute make! the **wheat stitch™ ghost** crochet pattern is an easy and fun halloween project perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike. this little ghost is worked in my signature ***[wheat stitch][1]*** from the top down in the round, creating a smooth, seamless body.

 **two finishing options:**
- make a bottomless ghost to place over led lights, fairy lights, or a jar of treats for a glowing halloween decoration.
- or stuff and seal it to create a soft, huggable ghost plushie for spooky season cuddles.

 **bonus accessories included:**
- a wickedly stylish witch hat worked from the top down.
- a plump mini pumpkin crocheted in rows, then stitched into shape.

whether you’re adding to your halloween amigurumi collection or making a one-of-a-kind handmade gift, this wheat stitch ghost will bring a touch of spooky-sweet magic to your crochet hook. 

[a video tutorial is included with the pattern.][2]

[g (4.0mm) - or size to meet gauge][3]

100% acrylic, 489yds/226g

abbreviations:
blo- back loop only
ch - chain
flo - front loop only
rs - right side
sc - single crochet
sc2tog - single crochet two together
sl st - slip stitch
st(s) - stitch(es)
ws - wrong side

gauge:
not critical for this pattern.

gauge is not critical for this pattern since you can make this amigurumi in any weight of yarn you prefer. for patterns that require a specific gauge, visit this blog post on what to adjust and how: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][14]

sizes:
one size

skill level:
advanced beginner
